name: Go Go Grow - Addictive Arcade Action
name_original: Go Go Grow - Addictive Arcade Action
description:
GO GO GROW is a minimalist, addictive, and fast paced one touch arcade game

How to play:
-->Touch the screen on the left to turn left, touch the screen on the right to turn right.
-->Avoid a clash with enemies and the walls to survive as long as you can.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
● Simple One Touch Controls
● Awesome Power ups.
● Endless (infinite) rush game play
● Online Leaderboard.
● An incredibly addictive and fast survival score chaser.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
